column1: Smoque BBQ////I had super high expectations coming in after seeing all the positive reviews. I shared a beef brisket with cole slaw and two other sides (chili and mac and cheese) and a pulled pork sandwich with the hubby. When the food came out
column2: the portion sizes were much smaller than expected. Luckily
column3: we weren't that hungry when we came for lunch. The pulled pork was just okay in my opinion...I preferred the beef brisket. The chili was unexciting--it was watery and had no meat in it. The mac and cheese was decent but I totally skipped out on the cole slaw (not a fan).
